name: City Cleaner 3D
description:
It's time to roll up your sleeves to clean up the town!

Jump right into the dirty work and start scrubbing to make the city sparkle again like the good old days.

Hop in your truck to pick up the overflowing trash on the streets, hoover up any remaining garbage on the streets, and tow away the illegally parked cars blocking the road.

Grab your rubber gloves and let's get scrubbing!

City Cleaner 3D features:
- Hoover up the litter in the streets
- Step into the tow truck and clear the road of parked cars
- Throw away the trash piling up on the sidewalks
